bids_suffix: Alphanumeric value, located after the key-value_ pairs (thus after the final _), right before the File extension. For example, it is eeg in sub-05_task-matchingpennies_eeg.vhdr
extension: Portion of the filename after the left-most period (.) preceded by any other alphanumeric. For example, .gitignore does not have a file extension, but the file extension of test.nii.gz is .nii.gz. Note that the left-most period is included in the file extension.
datatype: Functional group of different types of data.
